# File lib/ramaze/snippets/string/unindent.rb, line 10
      def unindent
        find_indent = proc{ |l| l.find{|l| !l.strip.empty?}.to_s[/^(\s+)/, 1] }

        lines = self.split("\n")
        space = find_indent[lines]
        space = find_indent[lines.reverse] unless space

        strip.gsub(/^#{space}/, '')
      end
